channel.title: dhcpd on Jeremy Hager
channel.description: Recent content in dhcpd on Jeremy Hager

item.title: New milestone and setting up networks
item.description: I’ve been busy! I created a new vm, dns-dhcp which will serve my dns and dhcp for the internal.virtnet environment. I configured dhcp to only hand out addresses to libvirt vms (they all start with 52:54:00), I’ve spent a few hours a day trying to find out why pxe boot wasn’t working on libvirt, and finally realized I had to create a new network for my environment. This post will be a bit longer than my typical blog posts, as it is a culmination of the last few weeks.
